status.name: Thanks for your support and understanding.
Thank you for leaving us alone but giving us enough attention to boost our egos.

जीना तभी सीखते है,
जब कोई न हो सहारा,
धन्यवाद उन लोगो को
जिन्होंने छोड़ा हमें बेसहारा.

शुक्रिया जिन्दगी जीने का हुनर सिखा दिया,
कैसे बदलते है लोग चंद कागज के टुकड़ो ने बता दिया.

धन्यवाद कहो उन जनाब को,
जो बिना स्वार्थ के मदत दे आपको.
Just a thank you is a mighty powerful prayer. Says it all.
I'd like to say to all my fans out there, thanks for the support. And to all my doubters, thank you very much because you guys have also pushed me.
Just want to THANK ALL OF YOU for making me feel special on my Birthday, Love You Guys.
Thank you for staying by my side even though it tried to push you away.
It is not happy people who are thankful. It is thankful people who are happy.

सौ-सौ धन्यवाद देता हूँ मैं बुरे वक्त को,
जिसने अपने और परायों की पहचान कराई.

धन्यवाद उन दोस्तों को जिनकी वजह से
मेरे चेहरे पर एक बड़ी मुस्कान रहती है.

हकीकत में वही धन्यवाद का हकदार है,
जो बिना स्वार्थ के मदत करने को तैयार है.
The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant.
I just want to thank you for what you taught me; to love, to be wise and serious and the most important, to reach my aims.
To my friends thank you for being there for me.
I feel a very unusual sensation – if it is not indigestion, I think it must be gratitude.
Well, there's not a day goes by when I don't get up and say thank you to somebody.
I could never be a member of a single party. I want the best of all worlds, thank you.
I wish I could tell someone how thankful I am for them because they helped me smile through the tears when I was falling apart. Thank you.
Thank you to all for your prayers and good wishes. It gave me the strength to persevere and warmed my heart.
Thank you for your lovely wishes it brought smiles to my eyes.
For your patience and caring, I just want to say: Thank you.

वो पत्नी धन्यवाद की हकदार होती है,
जो पति की ख़ुशी में अपनी ख़ुशी ढूँढ लेती है.

जो प्रेम से बोले और आपको प्यार दे
वो हमेशा ही धन्यवाद का पात्र होता है.

मेरे जीवनसाथी शुक्रिया तेरा,
तूने खुशियों से भर दिया घर मेरा.

हर पुत्र अपने माता-पिता का ऋणी होता है,
उन्हें धन्यवाद नहीं बोल सकते
पर जरूरत पर उनके साथ रह सकते है.

मैं शुक्रिया करू तेरा तो कहाँ तक करूँ,
मैंने सिर झुकाया कम तेरे एहसान बहुत है.

आज कुछ ऐसा करे कि कल आप खुद को
उस काम के लिए धन्यवाद दे सके.
No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
Thank you god for waking me up today and giving me another precious day of life.
The sun will not rise or set without my notice, and thanks.
Thank you for being my friend.
‘Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
Thank you for listening to me.
Dear past, thaks for all the lessons. Dear future, I am ready.

मेरी गर्लफ्रेंड हजारों की शौपिंग मुझसे करवाती है,
‘थैंक्स’ कहकर एक पल में ही एहसान उतार जाती है.

दिल की हर धड़कन धन्यवाद कहती है,
जो महबूबा दिल के जख्मों को भरती है.
Thank you for making me feel popular. Seriously, without you, people who like just about anything I post on Facebook, I'd feel like a pretty big loser.
Wishes to thank all my family and friends Who stopped by to show me love today. You have all made this an amazing day! Thank you all so very much. I love you.
It isn't what you have in your pocket that makes you thankful, but what you have in your heart.
Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living.
I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
To say thank you, is in recognition of humanity.God, I want to take a minute to simply say: thank you for all I have.
thanks to my family and friends who made my day more special than it is with your wishes. I am thankful to god for the years he has given me to be wiser in life.

वादा किया था तुमने साथ निभाने का,
शुक्रिया !!! शुक्रिया !!! दिल तोड़ जाने का.

अपनी गलतियों को धन्यवाद देना,
क्योंकि आपने सबसे ज्यादा उन्हीं से सीखा है.

जब जिन्दगी दूसरा मौका दे,
तो ईश्वर को धन्यवाद जरूर दे.

हृदय से कहा गया ‘धन्यवाद’
आपकी विनम्रता को प्रदर्शित करता है.
Thank you for helping us make this very special day of ours so memorable! We do appreciate it.
Thank you for all the special things you do.
